document_data.name: Denlor's Tower
document_data.mainbody: '''Denlor's Tower''' or '''Denelor's Tower''' was a former city defense structure in the city of [[Phlan]]. It was located in the harbor in the eastern part of the [[Phlan/Old City|Old City]]. It was claimed by [[Denelor the Red]], a [[Red Wizards of Thay|Red Wizard of Thay]] in [[1338 DR]] but history recounted that he "fell to the hordes of Phlan" only 2 years after. It was later in use by [[Rowena]] ''circa'' [[1370 DR]], who was also a Red Wizard.
